column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Over the summer , my friend and I decided to plant a tree .
#text=We always wanted to plant one but we never had the time to do it .
#text=Now we had the time and we were determined to plant the tree .
#text=We decided to plant the tree in my backyard since I have the bigger backyard .
#text=We , first , got all of our utensils and started planting the tree .
#text=We dug a hole and poured the seeds inside the hole .
#text=Every day , we would water the seed .
#text=We always hoped that the tree will miraculousy grow in weeks but we knew that was n't possible .
#text=It would take years for it to grow .
#text=We were so happy about planting our first tree that we decided to help our community parks now .
#text=We decided to help plant trees there as well .
#text=It may take years , but we know that we are contributing to our environment .
